legacy.description: Follow us to discover beautiful landscapes and typical lifestyles in China.
legacy.name: Guangming Daily

result.text:
In the heart of Xiangxi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture, Shibadong Village stands as a symbol of China's targeted poverty alleviation success. Long Xianlan, once battling alcoholism as an orphan in the Miao village, now thrives as a beekeeper, transforming not just his life but hundreds in neighboring villages. Shibadong's poverty incidence rate plummeted from 57% in 2013 to remarkable prosperity, with Long's annual income surpassing 400,000 yuan.#IPRCC
Read more at:
https://t.co/eo5QjqiD32

legacy.description: Follow us to discover beautiful landscapes and typical lifestyles in China.
legacy.name: Guangming Daily

result.text:
From poverty to prosperity – Shibadong village in Hunan, China, has seen an incredible turnaround thanks to targeted government programs. Once poverty-stricken, the village now thrives in industries like kiwi cultivation, golden tea production, and Miao embroidery. Beekeeping success stories and a booming tourism sector contribute to an impressive per capita income rise from 1,688 yuan in 2013 to 23,505 yuan in 2022. Shibadong is a shining example of how focused efforts can lift communities, proving that dreams can become reality. #ShibadongSuccess #PovertyAlleviation #IPRCC
Read more at:
https://t.co/mySpveyyKp

legacy.description: Follow us to discover beautiful landscapes and typical lifestyles in China.
legacy.name: Guangming Daily

result.text:
Shibadong Forum on Poverty Reduction and Development was held in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture, celebrating the 10th anniversary of China's targeted poverty alleviation concept. Governor Mao Weiming highlights remarkable achievements, with 6.82 million lifted from absolute poverty by 2020. Shibadong village exemplifies transformation, from 57% in absolute poverty to modern prosperity. A beacon for global poverty alleviation, urging enhanced dialogue and international cooperation. #PovertyReduction #ChinaSuccessStory #IPRCC
Read more at:
https://t.co/BRlLF14IU4
